text: Yesterday, Kylie Jenner said she'll no longer be sharing pictures of Stormi's face, and the reason is beyond heartbreaking. An insider told People that Kylie made the decision because of the ` ` nasty'' comments she was seeing on pictures of her daughter. “ Kylie felt so protective of her baby when she was pregnant. This is why she didn ’ t share any bump pictures while she was pregnant. After Stormi was born, Kylie was the proudest mom. ” Advertisement - Continue Reading Below “ She couldn ’ t wait to show off Stormi to her fans.
